PerfectNetExp.abs: ...》等开始在英国流行歌曲排行榜上崭露头角，进入前五名，不过真正大红大紫的歌曲还是1986年的旧曲新唱《维纳斯(venus)》，之后的《爱之罪(Love In The First Degree)》等歌曲也一直在英国流行歌坛占.
金星金星（Venus）是太阳系中八大行星之一，按离太阳由近及远的次序是第二颗。它是离地球最近的行星。
爱神维纳斯(Venus)，是美和爱的化身，是欢笑和婚姻的女神。她掌管着人间的爱情、婚姻、生育。

encyclopedia.content: 《Venus》是韩国男团神话演唱的歌曲，歌曲由李珉宇作词，收录在神话2012年专辑《THE RETURN》中，专辑于2012年3月28日发行。

means.word_mean: 1. the second nearest planet to the sun; visible as an early `morning star' or an `evening star'; rotates slowly clockwise (in the opposite direction from the normal rotation of the planets);

sentences.sentence: "before it was known that they were the same object the evening star was called Venus and the morning star was called Lucifer"

means.word_mean: 2. goddess of love; counterpart of Greek Aphrodite
3. type genus of the family Veneridae: genus of edible clams with thick oval shells
